articles.title: Remember Vaio? Iconic PC brand eyes India again but with a different partner - The Indian Express
articles.description: Laptops have become quite predictable, and if Vaio wants to reinvigorate the market, it needs to make them exciting again.
articles.content: The Vaio laptop is making a comeback in 2021, but with a different partner. Nexstgo the company which brought Avitas laptops to India has a license agreement with the Japan-based VAIO Corporation to … [+4286 chars]
